message: I appreciate the sentiment of a 50/50 split, but the value of the money decreases faster for you than for me. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a strong offer considering the time pressure.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split is the most I can offer while still being fair. We need to act quickly or the money will be worth even less.
Alice, we're running out of time. I understand your position, but my previous offer was more than fair considering the inflation rates. I'm adjusting it slightly to 58/42. This is my final offer.
